thread.title: Vignesh Sivan meets Superstar Rajinikanth at 2 point 0 shooting spot considers it as an Oscar - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Vignesh Sivan meets Superstar Rajinikanth at 2 point 0 shooting spot considers it as an Oscar - Tamil Movie News

title: Vignesh Sivan meets Superstar Rajinikanth at 2 point 0 shooting spot considers it as an Oscar - Tamil Movie News
text: Top Cops of Kollywood As we had reported earlier, the last leg of shooting of director Shankar's '2.0' is presently happening at a grand set erected in EVP Mall located in the outskirts of Chennai. The film's lead actor Superstar Rajinikanth is taking part in the shooting. In the same location, the shooting of Suriya's 'Thaanaa Serndha Koottam' is also happening in a set in which the 1980s period has been recreated. Vignesh Sivan the director 'TSA' is an ardent Rajinikanth fan and he got a opportunity to meet and greet his Thalaivar and also get a photograph with him, yesterday. The 'Poda Podi' director is on cloud nine and he calls it as precious as an Oscar award. This is how he reacted about the same in his Twitter page. On the day of #Oscars ..
